name: Whatsapp Dark Mode UI
description:
Hi Community!👋🏻


Have a look at the stunning design of most used messenger application i.e. WhatsApp.


Features Covered:

  1. Dark Mode Application UI
  2. Mobile View (iOS, Android)
  3. Automatic screen change after Meta Branding in 1000ms
  4. Chat screen
  5. Horizontal scroll for status and calls window
  6. Search Icon to find contacts, media, etc.
  7. Settings icon overlay
  8. Camera Screen with horizontal scrolling of media saved in smartphone
  9. Personal Chat screen
  10. All contact details button


Hope you will like it.


I started learning UI a week back. Open for suggestions and guidance.


Do shower your love, comment and follow me for more such designs.


Lets connect on Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/shivanshumathur


Cheers!!!😁

Happy Designing!
